Product Release Notes

Below are recent product updates for April-June 2022
If you would like be sent an email whenever this page changes, please see the Setup Automatic Email on Product Updates document.

Video Cloud

Feature: Drupal connector for Video Cloud

Product Area: Integrations

Date: 24-June-2022

Description: Updated for version 3.1.0 with support for in-page experiences

Go to Documentation

Feature: Ingestion via Aspera

Product Area: Ingestion

Date: 17-June-2022

Description: IBM Aspera is a popular solution for reliable high-speed file transfers. Brightcove offers a simple and flexible solution for adding videos and media assets to Video Cloud using Aspera.

Go to Documentation

Feature: Short Manifest TTL

Product Area: Playback API

Date: 10-June-2022

Description: In this topic, you will learn about setting a specific TTL for the manifest URLs.

Go to Documentation

Feature: Brightcove Video Connect for the WordPress CMS

Product Area: Wordpress integration

Date: 10-June-2022

Description: New release. Releases page link updated to point to the correct location.

Go to Documentation

Feature: Social Module supports publish to LinkedIn

Product Area: Social

Date: 3-June-2022

Description: Added LinkedIn information

Go to Documentation

Feature: It is now possible to publish Brightcove videos from Hootsuite

Product Area: Integrations

Date: 27-May-2022

Description: This topic explains how to publish Brightcove videos using Hootsuite.

Go to Documentation

Feature: Transcriptions is now a separate array, no longer included in text tracks

Product Area: CMS/Playback APIs

Date: 27-May-2022

Description: Added new Transcriptions field for videos

Go to Documentation

Feature: Google Cloud Storage as source file location

Product Area: Dynamic Ingest API

Date: 20-May-2022

Description: Signed Google Cloud Storage URLs are now supported for source files when using Dynamic Ingest.

Go to Documentation

Feature: Video Cloud Connector for Sitecore

Product Area: Integrations

Date: 20-May-2022

Description: New release provides enhanced support for Brightcove Players and In-Page Experiences

Go to Documentation

Feature: viewer dimension

Product Area: Analytics API

Date: 6-May-2022

Description: Added information about additional metrics that can be retrieved

Go to Documentation

Feature: Slates for Cloud Playout channels

Product Area: Cloud Playout

Date: 8-April-2022

Description: Enhancements to slates for Cloud PLayout channels

Go to Documentation

Feature: Set hard start time for channel content playback

Product Area: Cloud Playout

Date: 8-April-2022

Description: Set the exact time for channel content playback to begin, and fill time before that with a slate asset

Go to Documentation

Feature: Slate asset management

Product Area: Cloud Playout Channels API

Date: 8-April-2022

Description: Add operations for managing slate assets

Go to Documentation

Feature: New Release

Product Area: Word Press Connector

Date: 8-April-2022

Description: New release - the documentation now points to releases and documentation on the GitHub repo

Go to Documentation

Live

Feature: Rollover for end of "day" cue points

Product Area: Live API - SSAI cue points

Date: 17-June-2022

Description: Rollover feature to interpret cue points added within the last 10 minutes of a 24-hour period as scheduling breaks for the following 24-hour period.

Go to Documentation

Feature: Live multiple language audio tracks

Product Area: Multiple Language Audio

Date: 27-May-2022

Description: Updated steps for creating multiple language audio tracks

Go to Documentation

Feature: Deprecation of XSLT in Live SSAI Ad Configs

Product Area: SSAI

Date: 29-April-2022

Description: Removed ad_configuration_transforms from schema

Go to Documentation
